Issue.creator: ga25waq
Issue.summary: ResourceMgmtClient: Targets get populated with defaults if TargetFilter is set
Issue.description: ./pkg/fabric-txn/resmgmtclient/resmgmt.go:109 Consequently, the error > failed to determine target peers for JoinChannel is returned, since both the Targets slice and the TargetFilter are set. Quick fix: > len(opts.Targets) == 0 && opts.TargetFilter == nil >
